iframe.title: Game
iframe.allow: autoplay; fullscreen; camera; focus-without-user-activation *; monetization; gamepad; keyboard-map *; xr-spatial-tracking; clipboard-write
iframe.sandbox: allow-forms allow-modals allow-orientation-lock allow-pointer-lock allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-presentation allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-downloads
